00068 static void do_node_add(bContext *C, bNodeTemplate *ntemp)
00069 {
00070     Main *bmain= CTX_data_main(C);
00071     Scene *scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
00072     SpaceNode *snode= CTX_wm_space_node(C);
00073     ScrArea *sa= CTX_wm_area(C);
00074     ARegion *ar;
00075     bNode *node;
00076     
00077     /* get location to add node at mouse */
00078     for (ar=sa->regionbase.first; ar; ar=ar->next) {
00079         if (ar->regiontype == RGN_TYPE_WINDOW) {
00080             wmWindow *win= CTX_wm_window(C);
00081             int x= win->eventstate->x - ar->winrct.xmin;
00082             int y= win->eventstate->y - ar->winrct.ymin;
00083             
00084             if (y < 60) y+= 60;
00085             UI_view2d_region_to_view(&ar->v2d, x, y, &snode->mx, &snode->my);
00086         }
00087     }
00088     
00089     /* store selection in temp test flag */
00090     for (node= snode->edittree->nodes.first; node; node= node->next) {
00091         if (node->flag & NODE_SELECT) node->flag |= NODE_TEST;
00092         else node->flag &= ~NODE_TEST;
00093     }
00094     
00095     /* node= */ node_add_node(snode, bmain, scene, ntemp, snode->mx, snode->my);
00096     
00097     /* select previous selection before autoconnect */
00098     for (node= snode->edittree->nodes.first; node; node= node->next) {
00099         if (node->flag & NODE_TEST) node->flag |= NODE_SELECT;
00100     }
00101     
00102     /* deselect after autoconnection */
00103     for (node= snode->edittree->nodes.first; node; node= node->next) {
00104         if (node->flag & NODE_TEST) node->flag &= ~NODE_SELECT;
00105     }
00106         
00107     snode_notify(C, snode);
00108     snode_dag_update(C, snode);
00109 }
00110 
00111 static void do_node_add_static(bContext *C, void *UNUSED(arg), int event)
00112 {
00113     Main *bmain = CTX_data_main(C);
00114     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
00115     bNodeTemplate ntemp;
00116     
00117     ntemp.type = event;
00118     ntemp.main = bmain;
00119     ntemp.scene = scene;
00120     
00121     do_node_add(C, &ntemp);
00122 }
00123 
00124 static void do_node_add_group(bContext *C, void *UNUSED(arg), int event)
00125 {
00126     SpaceNode *snode= CTX_wm_space_node(C);
00127     Main *bmain = CTX_data_main(C);
00128     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
00129     bNodeTemplate ntemp;
00130     
00131     if (event>=0) {
00132         ntemp.ngroup= BLI_findlink(&G.main->nodetree, event);
00133         ntemp.type = ntemp.ngroup->nodetype;
00134     }
00135     else {
00136         ntemp.type = -event;
00137         switch (ntemp.type) {
00138         case NODE_GROUP:
00139             ntemp.ngroup = ntreeAddTree("Group", snode->treetype, ntemp.type);
00140             break;
00141         case NODE_FORLOOP:
00142             ntemp.ngroup = ntreeAddTree("For Loop", snode->treetype, ntemp.type);
00143             break;
00144         case NODE_WHILELOOP:
00145             ntemp.ngroup = ntreeAddTree("While Loop", snode->treetype, ntemp.type);
00146             break;
00147         default:
00148             ntemp.ngroup = NULL;
00149         }
00150     }
00151     if (!ntemp.ngroup)
00152         return;
00153     
00154     ntemp.main = bmain;
00155     ntemp.scene = scene;
00156     
00157     do_node_add(C, &ntemp);
00158 }

00160 #if 0 /* disabled */
00161 static void do_node_add_dynamic(bContext *C, void *UNUSED(arg), int event)
00162 {
00163     Main *bmain = CTX_data_main(C);
00164     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
00165     bNodeTemplate ntemp;
00166     
00167     ntemp.type = NODE_DYNAMIC;
00168     
00169     ntemp.main = bmain;
00170     ntemp.scene = scene;
00171     
00172     do_node_add(C, &ntemp);
00173 }
00174 #endif
00175 
00176 static int node_tree_has_type(int treetype, int nodetype)
00177 {
00178     bNodeTreeType *ttype= ntreeGetType(treetype);
00179     bNodeType *ntype;
00180     for (ntype=ttype->node_types.first; ntype; ntype=ntype->next) {
00181         if (ntype->type==nodetype)
00182             return 1;
00183     }
00184     return 0;
00185 }
00186 
00187 static void node_add_menu(bContext *C, uiLayout *layout, void *arg_nodeclass)
00188 {
00189     Main *bmain= CTX_data_main(C);
00190     Scene *scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
00191     SpaceNode *snode= CTX_wm_space_node(C);
00192     bNodeTree *ntree;
00193     int nodeclass= GET_INT_FROM_POINTER(arg_nodeclass);
00194     int event, compatibility= 0;
00195     
00196     ntree = snode->nodetree;
00197     
00198     if (!ntree) {
00199         uiItemS(layout);
00200         return;
00201     }
00202 
00203     if (ntree->type == NTREE_SHADER) {
00204         if (scene_use_new_shading_nodes(scene))
00205             compatibility= NODE_NEW_SHADING;
00206         else
00207             compatibility= NODE_OLD_SHADING;
00208     }
00209     
00210     if (nodeclass==NODE_CLASS_GROUP) {
00211         bNodeTree *ngroup;
00212         
00213         uiLayoutSetFunc(layout, do_node_add_group, NULL);
00214         
00215         /* XXX hack: negative numbers used for empty group types */
00216         if (node_tree_has_type(ntree->type, NODE_GROUP))
00217             uiItemV(layout, IFACE_("New Group"), 0, -NODE_GROUP);
00218         if (node_tree_has_type(ntree->type, NODE_FORLOOP))
00219             uiItemV(layout, IFACE_("New For Loop"), 0, -NODE_FORLOOP);
00220         if (node_tree_has_type(ntree->type, NODE_WHILELOOP))
00221             uiItemV(layout, IFACE_("New While Loop"), 0, -NODE_WHILELOOP);
00222         uiItemS(layout);
00223         
00224         for (ngroup=bmain->nodetree.first, event=0; ngroup; ngroup= ngroup->id.next, ++event) {
00225             /* only use group trees */
00226             if (ngroup->type==ntree->type && ELEM3(ngroup->nodetype, NODE_GROUP, NODE_FORLOOP, NODE_WHILELOOP)) {
00227                 uiItemV(layout, ngroup->id.name+2, 0, event);
00228             }
00229         }
00230     }
00231     else if (nodeclass==NODE_DYNAMIC) {
00232         /* disabled */
00233     }
00234     else {
00235         bNodeType *ntype;
00236         
00237         uiLayoutSetFunc(layout, do_node_add_static, NULL);
00238         
00239         for (ntype=ntreeGetType(ntree->type)->node_types.first; ntype; ntype=ntype->next) {
00240             if (ntype->nclass==nodeclass && ntype->name)
00241                 if (!compatibility || (ntype->compatibility & compatibility))
00242                     uiItemV(layout, IFACE_(ntype->name), 0, ntype->type);
00243         }
00244     }
00245 }
00246 
00247 static void node_menu_add_foreach_cb(void *calldata, int nclass, const char *name)
00248 {
00249     uiLayout *layout= calldata;
00250     uiItemMenuF(layout, IFACE_(name), 0, node_add_menu, SET_INT_IN_POINTER(nclass));
00251 }
00252 
00253 static void node_menu_add(const bContext *C, Menu *menu)
00254 {
00255     Scene *scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
00256     SpaceNode *snode= CTX_wm_space_node(C);
00257     uiLayout *layout= menu->layout;
00258     bNodeTreeType *ntreetype= ntreeGetType(snode->treetype);
00259 
00260     if (!snode->nodetree)
00261         uiLayoutSetActive(layout, 0);
00262     
00263     if (ntreetype && ntreetype->foreach_nodeclass)
00264         ntreetype->foreach_nodeclass(scene, layout, node_menu_add_foreach_cb);
00265 }
00266 
00267 void node_menus_register(void)
00268 {
00269     MenuType *mt;
00270 
00271     mt= MEM_callocN(sizeof(MenuType), "spacetype node menu add");
00272     strcpy(mt->idname, "NODE_MT_add");
00273     strcpy(mt->label, "Add");
00274     mt->draw= node_menu_add;
00275     WM_menutype_add(mt);
00276 }
